name: todolist-v1
description: It's a simple To-Do List, i made this as a exercise from The Complete 2023 Web Development Bootcamp by Angela Yu this was just a EJS and Node.js introduction and i want I will be back to make more improvements in this project. In this project I learned a new concept, like export function and make templates and layout using EJS.
author: Natanael Lima Santana
